title: 被中共取消订单的捷克钢琴已被本地亿万富豪买下并捐给当地学校
contents:
消息来源如下（英语，捷克语）
https://www.mbs.news/en/2020/09/piano-was-bought-from-petrof-by-billionaire-komarek-after-the-rejection-by-china.html
https://www.novinky.cz/ekonomika/clanek/piana-od-petrofu-po-odmitnuti-cinou-koupil-miliardar-komarek-40335685

“We decided to buy the pianos as soon as we found out about the problem. My wife and I agreed that our foundation would immediately dedicate them to Czech schools. We would like the 11 instruments to become a symbol of Czech pride and cohesion, “said Karel Komárek.

https://tekdeeps.com/the-petrof-piano-which-was-rejected-in-china-was-bought-by-the-komarek-foundation/
虽然义举解决了燃眉之急，但这篇报道中有提到大陆市场约占Petrof（钢琴制造商）份额的35%且有在大陆从事制造
For Petrof, the Chinese market, with a share of around 35 percent, is a key market. The company fears that international disputes will have an impact on its other contracts. In addition, Petrof also manufactures pianos in China.
